conjecture: For all monic real-rooted polynomials p, q of degree n with simple roots (p, q in P_n), the finite free Fisher information Phi_n satisfies the superadditivity inequality: 1/Phi_n(p ⊞_n q) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q), where ⊞_n is the Marcus-Spielman-Srivastava finite free additive convolution and Phi_n(p) = sum_{i=1}^n H_p(lambda_i)^2 with H_p(lambda_i) = sum_{j != i} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j) the discrete Hilbert transform.
author: orchestrator
